local_intent: Move above the T-block at a safe offset after confirming its pose.
assumptions: IsAt(t_block) is used as a coarse verification that the end-effector reached the above-block pose.
coherence_with_global: Matches the approach phase: detect t_block, move above it with 2cm clearance (1200 ms bin), then verify position. Values and nodes align with the global plan and library.
